short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A virtual pet you can pet and feed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet your new virtual buddy right in your browser! This fun and interactive Chrome extension brings you a lovable virtual pet to keep you company while you browse the web. Choose from five different pets: cat, dog, hamster, parrot, or fish, and enjoy feeding, petting, and interacting with them in a cozy, mini environment.

Why Download This Extension?

Perfect for Pet Lovers: If you love animals, this extension is a delightful way to bring a furry (or feathered!) friend into your day.
Interactive Fun: Your pet isn’t just for show! They react to your touch, and you can feed them treats, keeping them happy and well-cared-for.
Simple and Lightweight: Designed with minimal resources, this extension won’t slow down your browser but will brighten your mood.
Customization Options: Each pet has unique food and a cozy background for an enjoyable, personalized experience.
Add a little joy to your browsing experience with a virtual pet that’s always there to brighten your day!
